blogs.title: Data Science VS Machine Learning
blogs.body: In the 21st Century, two terms “Data Science” and “Machine Learning” are some of the most searched terms in the technology world. From 1st-year Computer Science students to big Organizations like Netflix, Amazon, etc are running behind these two techniques. And they also got the reason. In the world of data space, the era of Big Data emerged when organizations are dealing with petabytes and exabytes of data. It became very tough for industries for the storage of data until 2010. Now when popular frameworks like Hadoop and others solved the problem of storage, the focus is on processing the data. And here Data Science and Machine Learning play a big role. But How much data is Big Data?
blogs.author: Shreya Shrivastava
